text: Hello all, can anyone tell? that what is the minimum requirement in theme as per marketplace. Means if anyone want to publish his theme on marketplace as he create theme and push on marketplace for publishing, then marketplace review the theme first. So what is the parameters theme needs to pass, what thing needed necessary in A theme.
<@U02162GK9SP> asset marketplace requirements
We have instructions for how to submit your content to the marketplace. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines> From there you can see the marketplace requirements as well.

related: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines/compliance-design-code-quality>

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines/theme-requirements>
thanks <@U7SL518D6>,

:yougotitdude: If you have any further questions about the marketplace <#C2YGWHDKQ|marketplace> might be a good place to ask as we have a lot of marketplace providers, and HubSpotters who know things about the marketplace there.
Sure <@U7SL518D6>, biggest thanks

<@U7SL518D6> / <@U021H3TV338> / <@ULCSUPTGU> (I’m sorry, not sure of the right person to tag :see_no_evil: )- We had a submitted a theme last week that has been in the review process since. I’ve been checking on the status each day and it seemed to be in the “Approval pending” state until this morning when I went to check. It looks like the listings page has been updated and our listing has vanished. Even our live theme is showing as a draft, and our “sold” figures aren’t lining up with what’s showing on the actual marketplace listing, which is a bit confusing. Who’s the best person to talk about about a status update on our listing/do we need to restart the submission process..?

The best place to go with issues like this is HubSpot support. <http://help.HubSpot.com|help.HubSpot.com>

I would also suggest reviewing this announcement about the new asset marketplace <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/updated-asset-marketplace>
Thanks <@U7SL518D6> I’ll head over to the support team. Does this then mean that new theme submissions won’t be able to go live on the marketplace until August 3rd?

The theme you submitted last week could go live earlier pending the review queue and any potential updates required on your end. That being said you will need to resubmit in the new flow which launched today so that it will be featured in the new marketplace on 8/3. I’m going to flag the issue with your current theme to our team.
Thanks for clarifying <@ULCSUPTGU>! I appreciate the help :slightly_smiling_face:  We’ll resubmit the theme today. Will we maintain the position we had in the queue before the listing was dropped?
Have you guys found themes to be profitable on their own or only as a marketing tactic to upsell services/get clients?
<@UA5DFM7CK> and <@U25C65C3S> I feel like you two would have good insights to share on this. I know you also both have different business models you operate from.

Hey <@UDHT6N5SM> We’re an agency and very much “services first”. It’s been a great enabler for us but I know that <@UA5DFM7CK>’s killing it in sales and he’s much more non-agency approach than we are :slightly_smiling_face:
Hey Mike, what is the name of the theme that disappeared? Thanks!
<@ULCSUPTGU> Atlas Pro - SaaS Website Theme
Using the new theme validator, any ideas what this means?
Getting it for a whole bunch of things
